title: A Sociolinguistic approach to the study of Jimmy's character in John Osborne's look back in anger as seen from his use of impolite/polite expressions, taboo words and terms od address and reference
contributors: Anneke Heritaningsih Tupan (Advisor 1); Jusuf Imam Ibrahim (Examination Committee 1)
subjects: ENGLISH DRAMA-20TH CENTURY; OSBORNE, JOHN, 1929-... LOOK BACK IN ANGER
